title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to the boil and cook the spaghetti.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Drain the pasta, reserving some pasta water.
Toss the pasta with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture until creamy.
Serve with extra cheese and black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt, tikka masala paste, and salt for 1 hour.
Grill the chicken pieces until cooked through.
Fry chopped onions until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger paste, then add the tomatoes.
Simmer and add cream to the sauce.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
